text: Did you not see to those who exercised hypocrisy, they say to their brothers those who disbelieved from The Books` people: "If (E) you were brought out, we will go out (E) with you. And we do not obey anyone in (from) you ever (E), and if you were fought/killed, We will give you victory/aid (E)." And God witnesses/testifies that they truly are liars/deniers/falsifiers (E)
